title: Colima
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Colima CL, from a wide variety of genres like Balada, Grupera, Mexican, Ranchera and Spanish.  Enjoy stations such as Capital FM Colima - XETTT, Recuerdo 102.1 - XHOMA, Amor 99.7 - XHCOC-FM, Super 98.9 - XERL, Imagen 89.3 - XHCC and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.
